extends AndFilter
implements java.beans.PropertyChangeListener

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Filter applyingFilter
      The associated filter model.
      private AutoChoices autoChoices
      The autoChoices mode.
      private FiltersHandler.AutoSelector autoSelector
      The class performing the autoSelection, and following sorter changes.
      Note that autoSelection has no relationship with autoChoices, it is the feature to automatically select a row if the current filter filters out all the rows but one.
      private ChoicesHandler choicesHandler
      Instance to handle choices (choices) on each FilterEditor.
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,FilterEditor> editors
      All the editors, mapped by their filter position.
      private boolean filterOnUpdates
      If true, table updates trigger filter and sort updates.
      private boolean onWarning
      If true, the current filter hides all the rows.
      private IParserModel parserModel
      The associated filter model.
      private boolean pendingNotifications
      pendingNotifications keeps track of notifications to be sent to the observers, but were discarded because the variable sendNotifications was negative.
      (package private) int sendNotifications
      sendNotifications is used internally as a semaphore to disable temporarily notifications to the filter observers.
      private javax.swing.JTable table
      The associated table.

    • Field Detail

      • sendNotifications

        int sendNotifications
        sendNotifications is used internally as a semaphore to disable temporarily notifications to the filter observers. Notifications are only sent to the observers when this variable is non negative.

      • pendingNotifications

        private boolean pendingNotifications
        pendingNotifications keeps track of notifications to be sent to the observers, but were discarded because the variable sendNotifications was negative.

      • autoChoices

        private AutoChoices autoChoices
        The autoChoices mode.

      • autoSelector

        private FiltersHandler.AutoSelector autoSelector
        The class performing the autoSelection, and following sorter changes.
        Note that autoSelection has no relationship with autoChoices, it is the feature to automatically select a row if the current filter filters out all the rows but one.

      • editors

        private java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,FilterEditor> editors
        All the editors, mapped by their filter position.

      • table

        private javax.swing.JTable table
        The associated table.

      • choicesHandler

        private ChoicesHandler choicesHandler
        Instance to handle choices (choices) on each FilterEditor.

      • parserModel

        private IParserModel parserModel
        The associated filter model.

      • applyingFilter

        private Filter applyingFilter
        The associated filter model.

      • filterOnUpdates

        private boolean filterOnUpdates
        If true, table updates trigger filter and sort updates.

      • onWarning

        private boolean onWarning
        If true, the current filter hides all the rows.

      • setAutoSelection

        public void setAutoSelection(boolean enable)

        Sets the autoselection mode

        if autoSelection is true, if there is only one possible row to select on the table, it will be selected.

      • filterUpdated

        ComposedFilter interface.
        Specified by:
        filterUpdated in interface IFilterObserver
        Overrides:
        filterUpdated in class ComposedFilter

      • applyEditorFilter

        public boolean applyEditorFilter(Filter filter)
        Applies the passed filter, from an associated editor, and, on success, reports it to observers. This method can be called -instead of the usual FilterEditor.reportFilterUpdatedToObservers to detect if the new filter will filter out all the rows.

      • consolidateFilterChanges

        public boolean consolidateFilterChanges(int modelIndex)
        Method called when an editor has ended typing changes.
        Returns:
        the current warning state

      • updateTableFilter

        public void updateTableFilter()
        Method to set/update the filtering.

      • getEditors

        public java.util.Collection<FilterEditor> getEditors()
        Returns all registered FilterEditors.

      • getEditor

        public FilterEditor getEditor(int column)
        Returns the FilterEditor instance on the given column.

      • enableNotifications

        public void enableNotifications(boolean enable)

        Temporarily enable/disable notifications to the observers, including the registered JTable.

        Multiple calls to this method can be issued, but the caller must ensure that there are as many calls with true parameter as with false parameter, as the notifications are only re-enabled when the zero balance is reached.

      • notifyUpdatedFilter

        void notifyUpdatedFilter()
        Internal method to send a notification to the observers, verifying first if the notifications are currently enabled.

      • tableUpdated

        public void tableUpdated()
        Report that the table is updated.

      • checkWarningState

        private void checkWarningState()
        Verifies if the current filter is hiding all table' rows.
